code: import React,{useState}from"react";import TaskList from"./components/TaskList";import AddTaskForm from"./components/AddTaskForm";import Dropdown from"./components/Dropdown";import Header from"./components/Header";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[selectedPriority,setSelectedPriority]=useState("");const addTask=task=>{setTasks([...tasks,task]);};const deleteTask=taskId=>{setTasks(tasks.filter(task=>task.id!==taskId));};const priorityOptions=["High","Medium","Low"];const handlePrioritySelect=priority=>{setSelectedPriority(priority);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col min-h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto flex-grow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-1 md:col-span-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 transition-opacity duration-500 ease-in-out",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddTaskForm,{addTask:addTask})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-1 md:col-span-1 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 transition-transform duration-500 ease-in-out transform translate-x-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown,{options:priorityOptions,onSelect:handlePrioritySelect}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-600 mt-2",children:selectedPriority&&"Selected Priority: ".concat(selectedPriority)})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-1 md:col-span-1 shadow-lg rounded-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 transition-opacity duration-200 ease-in-out",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskList,{tasks:tasks,deleteTask:deleteTask})})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export default App;
